architectural_notes: Persist daily-tracker completion data per month (and year) so each month loads/saves independently when selected.
known_issues: Daily tracker shows February values even when a different month (e.g., March) is selected after marking tasks completed.

existing_features.title: Ensure the Daily Tracking grid displays completion state and any saved values for the currently selected month/year only, so switching to another month (e.g., March) never shows data from a different month (e.g., February).

When the user switches months in the Daily Tracking view, do not render the previous month’s records while the new month’s records are being fetched; instead, show an empty state for the grid (all unchecked) or a loading/skeleton state until the selected month/year records query resolves.

Make record mapping in the Daily Tracking grid robustly month-separated by ensuring any client-side keys/maps used to look up records cannot collide across months/years (e.g., include month/year in the lookup key), even if records from multiple months were ever present in memory.

new_feature_requests.summary: Daily tracker: store and display completed-task values separately per month; when switching months load that month’s saved values, and persist changes permanently (only show completed values once box is ticked)

projectName: Fix Daily Tracking to store and display completed values per month (no February bleed-over)
